Blackstorm:

"Hi Maxima"said Happy the femme, who she felt better for the 
training-hit that Kitkat did "She's Kitkat, I guess that you meet 
her" After Maxima asked her she replied "I don't know... Honest, 
Perceptor told me that a fight with a Maximals was so hard that when 
they shot me... My memory circuits were damaged and all my memories 
was erased" OF course it was a Perceptor's lie, He had erased her 
circuits and programed her as Predaconm she added "Perhaps my skill 
were erased too, and I have to start again and train harder if I 
want to slag those maximals "



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 4/22/03 7:24:32 PM Central Daylight Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > "I understand..."said Blackstorm who was whilling to learn "what 
will 
> > be first???'"
> > 
> 
> Spotting a place to spar, she opened to a vast room. 
> 
> Stepping inside, she went to a console. "One understanding is the 
past. Since 
> you are new to the cause, surely you programming of the past is 
rather... ill 
> equipped." 
> 
> This was more of a ploy to find out what Blackstorm knew, & what 
she had. 
> Being one of Megatron's warriors & watching him since the Golden 
Age didn't 
> make her stupid nor ignorant by any means.  Careful observation 
was one of 
> her keys to success. 
> 
> "Tell me what you know."
